fields.name: response_column
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: include_algos
fields.title: Include Algos
fields.description: This is the list of Algorithms to be used for training. By default all algos will be selected, 'lr','lasso','ridge','en','lar','llar','omp','br','ard','par','ransac','tr','huber','kr','svm','knn','dt','rf','et','ada','gbr','mlp','xgboost','lightgbm','catboost'.

fields.name: train_size
fields.title: Train size
fields.description: Percent of data to be used for training. The rest of the data will be used for validation of the model built.

fields.name: top_n_model
fields.title: Top N Models
fields.description: Number of Top N models to select to show on leaderboard.

fields.name: imputation_type
fields.title: Imputation Type
fields.description: The type of imputation to use. Can be either 'simple' or 'iterative'.

fields.name: iterative_imputation_iters
fields.title: Iterative Imputation Iters
fields.description: Number of iterations. Ignored when imputation type is not ``iterative``.

fields.name: categorical_features
fields.title: Categorical Features
fields.description: It takes a list of strings with column names that are categorical.

fields.name: categorical_imputation
fields.title: Categorical Imputation
fields.description: Missing values in categorical features are imputed with a constant ``not available`` value. The other available option is ``mode``.

fields.name: categorical_iterative_imputer
fields.title: Categorical Iterative Imputer
fields.description: Estimator for iterative imputation of missing values in categorical features.

fields.name: high_cardinality_features
fields.title: High Cardinality Features
fields.description: When categorical features contains many levels, it can be compressed into fewer levels using this parameter. It takes a list of strings with column names that are categorical.

fields.name: high_cardinality_method
fields.title: High Cardinality Method
fields.description: Categorical features with high cardinality are replaced with the frequency ofvalues in each level occurring in the training dataset. Other available method is clustering which trains the K-Means clustering algorithm on the statistical attribute of the training data and replaces the original value of feature with the cluster label

fields.name: numeric_features
fields.title: Numeric Features
fields.description: If the inferred data types are not correct or the silent param is set to True, ``numeric features`` param can be used to overwrite or define the data types.

fields.name: numeric_imputation
fields.title: Numeric Imputation
fields.description: Missing values in numeric features are imputed with 'mean' value of the feature in the training dataset. The other available option is 'median' or 'zero'.

fields.name: numeric_iterative_imputer
fields.title: Numeric Iterative Imputer
fields.description: Estimator for iterative imputation of missing values in numeric features.

fields.name: date_features
fields.title: Date Features
fields.description: If the inferred data types are not correct or the silent param is set to True, ``date features`` param can be used to overwrite or define the data types. It takes a list of strings with column names that are DateTime.

fields.name: ignore_features
fields.title: Ignore Features
fields.description: This param can be used to ignore features during model training. It takes a list of strings with column names that are to be ignored.

fields.name: normalize
fields.title: Normalize
fields.description: When set to True, it transforms the numeric features by scaling them to a given range.

fields.name: normalize_method
fields.title: Normalize Method
fields.description: Defines the method for scaling.

fields.name: transformation
fields.title: Transformation
fields.description: When set to True, it transforms the numeric features by scaling them to a given range.

fields.name: transformation_method
fields.title: Transformation Method
fields.description: Defines the method for transformation.

fields.name: handle_unknown_categorical
fields.title: Handle Unknown Categorical
fields.description: When set to True, unknown categorical levels in unseen data are replaced by the most or least frequent level as learned in the training dataset.

fields.name: unknown_categorical_method
fields.title: Unknown Categorical Method
fields.description: Method used to replace unknown categorical levels in unseen data.

fields.name: pca
fields.title: PCA
fields.description: When set to True, dimensionality reduction is applied to project the data into a lower dimensional space using the method defined in ``pca method`` parameter.

fields.name: pca_method
fields.title: PCA Method
fields.description: Method used to replace unknown categorical levels in unseen data.

fields.name: ignore_low_variance
fields.title: Ignore Low Variance
fields.description: When set to True, all categorical features with insignificant variances are removed from the data.

fields.name: combine_rare_levels
fields.title: Combine Rare Levels
fields.description: When set to True, frequency percentile for levels in categorical features below a certain threshold is combined into a single level.

fields.name: rare_level_threshold
fields.title: Rare Level Threshold
fields.description: Percentile distribution below which rare categories are combined. Ignored when ``combine rare levels`` is not True.

fields.name: remove_outliers
fields.title: Remove Outliers
fields.description: When set to True, outliers from the training data are removed using the Singular Value Decomposition.

fields.name: outliers_threshold
fields.title: Outliers Threshold
fields.description: The percentage outliers to be removed from the training dataset. Ignored when ``remove outliers`` is not True.

fields.name: remove_multicollinearity
fields.title: Remove Multicollinearity
fields.description: When set to True, features with the inter-correlations higher than the defined threshold are removed. When two features are highly correlated with each other,  the feature that is less correlated with the target variable is removed. Only considers numeric features.

fields.name: multicollinearity_threshold
fields.title: Multicollinearity Threshold
fields.description: Threshold for correlated features. Ignored when ``remove multicollinearity`` is not True.

fields.name: remove_perfect_collinearity
fields.title: Remove Perfect Collinearity
fields.description: When set to True, perfect collinearity (features with correlation = 1) is removed from the dataset, when two features are 100% correlated, one of it is randomly removed from the dataset.

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Model Save Path.
